text: Ma Huateng (, born on October 29, 1971), also known as Pony Ma, is a Chinese businessman, investor, politician, and philanthropist. He is the founder, chairman and chief executive officer of Tencent.Investing in China: The Emerging Venture Capital Industry Jonsson Yinya Li, Google Book SearchTencent Tencent official site ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese businesspeople Category:Chinese politicians
title: Ma Huateng
